commit.message:
re PR c++/20157 (Internal compiler error on invalid code)

	PR c++/20157
	* pt.c (determine_specialization): Reject non-specializations.

	PR c++/20157
	* g++.dg/template/error18.C: New test.

From-SVN: r96414
